sentences.en: He has to take pills to control his blood pressure.
He paid the pill by cashing in some bonds.
sentences.cn: 他把一些证券兑换成现金付账.

sentences.en: He sweetened the pill by increasing wages, although by slightly less than he raised prices.
sentences.cn: 他提高了工资以使人们更易接受，尽管涨幅略低于他的价格升幅。

sentences.en: I wake at 6 am as the sleeping pill doesn't work for more than nine hours.
sentences.cn: 安眠药的药效不会超过9个小时，所以我清晨6点就醒了。

sentences.en: It was at that time she started taking the contraceptive pill.
sentences.cn: 她就是从那个时候开始服用避孕药的。

sentences.en: She had been on the pill for three years.
sentences.cn: 她吃口服避孕药已有3年。

sentences.en: Some believe this level of compensation is essentially a poison pill to put off any rival bidders.
sentences.cn: 有些人认为这种程度的补偿实质上是阻止任何投标对手的“毒丸”防御。

sentences.en: Take a pill every three hours.
The boy spat out the pill after eating off its sugar coating.
sentences.cn: 孩子吃掉药丸外面的糖,却把药吐了出来.

sentences.en: The contraceptive pill is the worst offender, but it is not the only drug to deplete the body's vitamin levels.
sentences.cn: 避孕药的危害最大，但是它并不是唯一一种消耗体内维生素的药物。

sentences.en: The pill is the most efficient method of birth control.
sentences.cn: 服用避孕药是最有效的避孕方法。

sentences.en: The pill itself has changed a lot since it first came onto the market.
sentences.cn: 该药片本身自首次进入市场以来已经有了很大改变。

sentences.en: There are two types of contraceptive pill available and these are described overleaf.
sentences.cn: 现有两种避孕药物，说明请见背面。

sentences.en: There was an impressive array of pill bottles stacked on top of the fridge.
sentences.cn: 冰箱上显眼地摆放着许多药瓶。

sentences.en: This pill is to be sucked , not swallowed.
You're too old to be given a job. That's a bitter pill to swallow.
sentences.cn: 你年龄太大了，没人愿意再给工作，这是你不得不接受的现实。

words.tran_cn: 把…制成丸剂；使服用药丸；抢劫，掠夺（古语）

phrases.tran_cn: 毒药丸（比喻公司为避免被对方兼并而向对方索取极高代价的阻挠措施）
使苦差事变得容易接受

trans.tran_cn: 药丸，口服避孕药，讨厌的人
trans.tran_en: a small solid piece of medicine that you swallow whole
